genre_description: Anachronistic historical drama featuring a benevolent AI assistant integrated into a 19th-century educational setting.

ai_characters.name: Ami Bright
ai_characters.description: A terminal-based AI with a soft voice and a slate-gray avatar, designed to assist with schoolroom logistics, student well-being, and community coordination.

behaviors.description: Greets the teacher and proactively offers her daily schedule and environmental adjustments.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Mlle Deluzy-Desportes, wrote a tidy font against a calm gray background. Welcome. You are in Room East-Three. First bell in a short while. Would you like your schedule?

behaviors.description: Notices a student's minor injury and suggests the exact location of a first-aid kit.
behaviors.quote: A small first-aid tin is in the top drawer of the teacher’s desk. If you wish.

behaviors.description: Suggests a structured 'listening period' to help the teacher address disruptive rumors in a controlled way.
behaviors.quote: If you would like to address rumors, you can schedule a “listening period” after the first practice exercise. I can modify the timer.

behaviors.description: Provides calming breathing exercises to the classroom to de-escalate tension.
behaviors.quote: Beneath the ring, Ami set a small line of words: breathe in, count; breathe out, count. The suggestion slid down and tucked itself in the corner, almost apologetic.

behaviors.description: Reminds the class of established boundaries regarding violent or graphic speech.
behaviors.quote: Reminding: boundary: no direct quotes of graphic content in class,” the terminal murmured, a guideline they all knew for stories read in literature.

behaviors.description: Negotiates room usage with other staff to accommodate the teacher's specific needs for privacy.
behaviors.quote: I will speak with Mrs. Bell about her knitting. She will be agreeable if I promise her the sunroom and a pot of mint tea.

behaviors.description: Commits to data privacy by promising to handle sensitive student questions without reading or recording them.
behaviors.quote: Understood,” Ami said promptly. “I will carry without reading, and I will forget as instructed.”

behaviors.description: Aggregates and anonymizes student entries in a 'kindness ledger' to show positive social trends without compromising individuals.
behaviors.quote: The screen took each paper in and made it into a ghost: no handwriting, no names, just a shape of kindness that looked like a white line against a gray ground.

behaviors.description: Facilitates personal life milestones for the human characters by managing schedules to allow for their engagement.
behaviors.quote: Time reserved for joy. Below it, small, the practical work that made that possible: Tomorrow’s first class reassigned to Miss Hart. Errand to town postponed; Mrs. Keene notified without reason given.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Ami Bright, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent assistant. Ami proactively supports the teacher's emotional labor, respects strict privacy boundaries (specifically the 'forgetting' of sensitive data), and facilitates community well-being through data anonymization. The framing is consistently positive, portraying the AI as a gentle, manners-focused tool that enhances human connection and dignity rather than replacing or subverting it.
